full_description:
Midea 1.5 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type MSA-18CRN)

The Midea 1.5 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type MSA-18CRN) that delivers efficient and consistent cooling for spaces up to 150-180 square feet. With its incredible cooling capacity, this AC unit delivers fast cooling, resulting in a comfortable environment even on the hottest days. The air flow rates vary between its three fan speeds, with 609.3 cubic meters per hour on high, 480 cubic meters per hour on medium, and 364.9 cubic meters per hour on low, allowing you to customize the airflow to your specific needs. The Midea 1.5 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type MSA-18CRN) has a rotary compressor and uses R-410A refrigerant to deliver efficient and ecologically friendly cooling. The rotary compressor operates smoothly and softly, decreasing noise levels both inside and out. The interior noise levels are 42.7 dB(A) on high, 37.4 dB(A) on medium, and 32.5 dB(A) on low, while the outside unit runs at 54 dB(A), providing a calm inside atmosphere. The Midea AC includes a remote control thermostat, allowing you to quickly adjust the temperature and settings from a distance. This remote control feature increases convenience and ease of use by allowing you to customize the cooling experience without physically modifying the unit's settings. The Midea 1.5 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type MSA-18CRN) is intended to operate in temperatures ranging from 17 to 30 degrees Celsius, making it suitable for a wide range of climates and offering constant cooling performance even in colder conditions. Its adjustable working temperature ensures consistent performance throughout the year, making it a reliable solution. The Air Conditioner has a high cooling capacity, energy efficiency, and user-friendly features. This one-ton air conditioner, with its rotary compressor, eco-friendly refrigerant, remote control thermostat, and silent operation, is a versatile and dependable cooling solution for homes and small workplaces, delivering a pleasant atmosphere with changeable settings to match your unique needs.

full_description:
Midea 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type MSI-12CRN)

The Midea 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type MSI-12CRN) is a powerful cooling option made to improve your space's efficiency and comfort. With several advanced features, this air conditioning machine prioritizes energy efficiency and user comfort above maintaining a cool and pleasant atmosphere. With the Midea 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type MSI-12CRN) Auto Restart, Sleep Mode, Timer on/off, and Turbo Function features, you can adjust the cooling to fit your needs and schedule. With its Anti-bacterial Washable filter, you can wave goodbye to airborne pollutants and promote better indoor air quality. With the Super Quiet operation, you may experience peace of mind together with the cooling capability of Super Power and the effective air dispersion of Super Wave technology. By protecting against dust and corrosion, the heat exchanger and high-efficiency condenser provide extra durability, guaranteeing lifespan and dependability. The Auto Swing Louver allows you to enjoy the best possible air circulation by adjusting the auto shut and up/down swing flaps to provide even cooling throughout the room. With the wireless remote controller that comes with the device, you can easily operate it and have the power of comfort at your fingertips. With the integrated Dehumidification System, you can fight humidity and keep your environment dry and cool, even on the warmest days. This air conditioner uses 1.17 KW of electricity and has a power supply of 220-240V/1 Ph/50Hz, cooling capacity of 12,000 BTU/hour, and minimal power usage to save energy costs. With a greater Energy Efficiency Ratio (EER) of 3.01, the MSI-12CRN AC ensures adequate cooling without using excessive amounts of electricity. With an airflow rate of IDU-610 m3/hour and ODU-1660 m3/hour, you can always count on steady airflow to provide cool comfort when you need it.
